content.raw:
Ah sorry @clalancette , I mentioned on one of the comments that I've only generated unique.world for now while it's being reviewed, and will generate all the finals worlds once this is approved. I should have mentioned that on the top.

Also, I forgot to mention, but you should use [this deb](#!/osrf/srcsim/issues/170/integrate-re-harness-into-checkpoint#comment-36910009) for `val_description`.
